DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate long-term safety efficacy oxymetazoline hydrogen chloride ( HCL ) Cream 1.0 % ( AGN-199201 ) patient persistent erythema associate rosacea .
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Safety Efficacy Study AGN-19920 Patients With Persistent Erythema Associated With Rosacea
DOC.criteria: Moderate severe persistent facial erythema associate rosacea . Current treatment monoamine oxidase ( MAO ) inhibitors Raynaud 's syndrome , narrow angle glaucoma , orthostatic hypotension , scleroderma Sjogren 's syndrome .
